mapper.select: select a.cust_id as custId , b.performance_kind_cd as performanceKindCd , b.performance_name as performanceName , b.performance_price as performancePrice , b.performance_date as performanceDate , c.reservation_seat_information as reservationSeatInformation , c.reservation_number as reservationNumber from member a , performance_info_m b , reservation_info_m c where a.cust_id = c.cust_id and b.performance_id = c.performance_id and a.cust_id=#{custId}

select a.reservation_seat_information as reservationSeatInformation , a.performance_id as performanceId , a.sold_yn as soldYn , b.performance_kind_cd as performanceKindCd , b.performance_name as performanceName , b.performance_price as performancePrice , b.performance_date as performanceDate from assignment_ticket a, performance_info_m b where a.performance_id=b.performance_id and notice_id=#{noticeId}
